title: Deamhan
description: In the city of Minneapolis, Deamhan have thrived for decades. But when a mother disappears on its streets, her daughter, Veronica Austin, is forced to navigate this precarious world of psychic vampires who rule the cityâ€™s darkest corners.As she navigates their world, she realizes that the true threat may not be the creatures themselves, but her own father - the president of a ruthless organization of researchers who will stop at nothing to maintain their power.The line between friend and foe blurs as Veronica dives into a treacherous landscape of deception and betrayal. With alliances forged and broken, she must summon all her wit and strength to survive in this thrilling tale of suspense and intrigue. But when she finally uncovers the shocking truth, she realizes that the most dangerous twist of all may be the one she never saw coming.
author: Isaiyan Morrison
